acdErp.name: acdErp

revisions.description: Initial version of MIB module ACD-ERP-MIB.

acdErp.contactinfo: Accedian Technical Assistance Center Accedian Networks, Inc. 2351 Alfred-Nobel blvd., Suite N-410 Saint-Laurent, Quebec Canada H4S 2A9 E-mail: support@accedian.com
acdErp.description: The ERP database for this Accedian Networks device.

AcdErpVlanType.name: AcdErpVlanType
AcdErpVlanType.description: The type of VLAN to be used.

AcdErpPortStateType.name: AcdErpPortStateType
AcdErpPortStateType.description: The status of the port's forwarding.

AcdErpStateType.name: AcdErpStateType
AcdErpStateType.description: The state of the ERP instance.

AcdErpPortStatusType.name: AcdErpPortStatusType
AcdErpPortStatusType.description: The state of the port's signal.

acdErpConfigTable.name: acdErpConfigTable
acdErpConfigTable.description: This table contains all instance of ERP of this unit.

acdErpConfigEntry.name: acdErpConfigEntry
acdErpConfigEntry.description: An entry consisting of all settings for an instance.

acdErpConfigRowStatus.name: acdErpConfigRowStatus
acdErpConfigRowStatus.description: All columns must have a valid value before a row can be activated. To create a new Service you shall provide a unique name for an empty row with the RowStatus set to Create and Go.

acdErpConfigName.name: acdErpConfigName
acdErpConfigName.description: A unique name used to identify the instance

acdErpConfigRPLPort.name: acdErpConfigRPLPort
acdErpConfigRPLPort.description: The index of the port used as RPL.

acdErpConfigHoldOffTimer.name: acdErpConfigHoldOffTimer
acdErpConfigHoldOffTimer.description: The hold off timer duration in ms.

acdErpConfigRevertive.name: acdErpConfigRevertive
acdErpConfigRevertive.description: This indicates if the ERP is in revertive state.

acdErpConfigGuardTimer.name: acdErpConfigGuardTimer
acdErpConfigGuardTimer.description: The guard timer duration in ms.

acdErpConfigWTRTimer.name: acdErpConfigWTRTimer
acdErpConfigWTRTimer.description: The WTR timer duration in minutes.

acdErpConfigVids0to1023.name: acdErpConfigVids0to1023
acdErpConfigVids0to1023.description: Each octet specifies a set of eight VLANs, the first octet specifying VLAN ID 0 through 7, and so on. Within each octet, the most significant bit represents the lowest numbered VLAN ID. If that bit has a value of '1' then that VLAN is included in the set of VLANs; the VLAN is not included otherwise.

acdErpConfigVids1024to2047.name: acdErpConfigVids1024to2047
acdErpConfigVids1024to2047.description: Each octet specifies a set of eight VLANs, the first octet specifying VLAN ID 0 through 7, and so on. Within each octet, the most significant bit represents the lowest numbered VLAN ID. If that bit has a value of '1' then that VLAN is included in the set of VLANs; the VLAN is not included otherwise.

acdErpConfigVids2048to3071.name: acdErpConfigVids2048to3071
acdErpConfigVids2048to3071.description: Each octet specifies a set of eight VLANs, the first octet specifying VLAN ID 0 through 7, and so on. Within each octet, the most significant bit represents the lowest numbered VLAN ID. If that bit has a value of '1' then that VLAN is included in the set of VLANs; the VLAN is not included otherwise.

acdErpConfigVids3072to4095.name: acdErpConfigVids3072to4095
acdErpConfigVids3072to4095.description: Each octet specifies a set of eight VLANs, the first octet specifying VLAN ID 0 through 7, and so on. Within each octet, the most significant bit represents the lowest numbered VLAN ID. If that bit has a value of '1' then that VLAN is included in the set of VLANs; the VLAN is not included otherwise.
